Articles.Content:
Purchased, downloaded, installed (checked permissions), copied shortcut to desktop, and run...

Game opens, checks for update, and then the "update" button appears, while the "play" button is disabled. Clicking the "update" button opens the terminal... and then nothing else happens, ever (see attached screen-shot).

HELP!

Welcome to the forums!

This is one of the known issues and until this week, the only workaround was to skip the Launcher entirely (you can always run KSP directly). Ted posted an updated launcher in this thread. That will at least let you run Launcher, but Patcher (the updater) won't work without a separate update.
